animeTitle: Kimi ni Todoke 2nd Season: Minitodo Gekijou
animeDescription: DVD and BD-Box original animation shorts.   Episodes 1 and 2 (DVD and BD) are short fairy tales of Cinderella and Snow White from Kurumi's telling, respectively.  Episode 3 (BD only) is a stage performance of Romeo and Juliet by Kazehaya and Sawako with Chizuru, Ayane, Ryuu in the backstage and Miura as the announcer.
animeCharacters: ['Kuronuma, Sawako', 'Kazehaya, Shouta', 'Kurumizawa, Ume', 'Sanada, Ryuu', 'Yoshida, Chizuru', 'Yano, Ayane', 'Arai, Kazuichi', 'Miura, Kento']
animeVoices: ['Noto, Mamiko', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Hirano, Aya', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Sanpei, Yuuko', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Miyano, Mamoru']
